source:
from urllib.request import urlopen
from urllib.request import Request
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
import pandas as pd

my_url = 'http://eadb.org/project/'
hah='page/'
url_list = [my_url + hah + str(a) + '/' for a in range(1,6)]

total = []
for i in url_list:
    req = Request(i,headers={'User-Agent':'Mozilla/5.0'})
    client = urlopen(req)
    page = client.read()
    client.close()
    soup = BeautifulSoup(page,"html.parser")
    links = [a['href'] for a in soup.find_all('a',href = True)]
    qualified = pleh(links)
    total+=qualified
total

for i in total:
    req = Request(i,headers={'User-Agent':'Mozilla/5.0'})
    client = urlopen(req)
    page = client.read()
    client.close()
    soup = BeautifulSoup(page,"html.parser")
    clients.append(soup.find_all("div",{"class": "portfolio-term"})[0].text)
    dates.append(soup.find_all("div",{"class": "portfolio-term"})[1].text)
    locations.append(soup.find_all("div",{"class": "portfolio-term"})[2].text)
    descriptions.append(soup.findAll("div",{"class":"portfolio-info"})[0].text.split('\n')[2])
    shares.append(soup.find_all("div",{"class": "portfolio-term"})[3].text)
df = pd.DataFrame({"description":descriptions,"client":clients,"date":dates,"location":locations,"share":shares})
